item.title: How to add a comment functionality using uterances
item.description: What is Utterances? A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues. Use GitHub issues for blog comments. Open source. Allow Markdown syntax. Configuration Create an empty Github repo. Install utterances app on that repo In the utterances app, only select the repo just created for comment. Update config.toml as below: [params.utteranc] enable = true repo = "owner/comments_for_hugo" issueTerm = "pathname" theme = "github-light" Create contents/ folders in layouts directory.
